mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community (name, country, short_description) VALUES (#{name}, #{country}, #{shortDescription})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.name, c.country, c.short_description, c.create_time, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user u WHERE u.community_id = c.id AND role = 0 OR u.country = c.country AND role = 2) AS memberCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project p WHERE p.community_id = c.id) AS projectCount FROM community c WHERE c.name = #{name}
